title: net/rpc: The client.Go result is different between Win7 and Linux.
body:
The client.Go use the same buffer chan *rpc.Call.
The test output is different

-----------------------------------------------------------
Win6/amd64

go version
go version devel +24deeb374803 Tue Jun 04 21:51:22 2013 -0700 windows/amd64

go run rpctest.go
2013/06/06 16:55:14 Add: expected 0 got 15
exit status 1

-----------------------------------------------------------
CentOS6.3/amd64

go version
go version go1.1 linux/amd64

go run rpctest.go
Arith: 7+8=15
Arith: 7*8=56

-----------------------------------------------------------
Attachments: 1. rpctest.go (1632 bytes)
